sentences.sContent: In Finland purists insist that only birch bark should be added.
sentences.sContent_eng: In Finland purists insist that only birch bark should be added.
sentences.sCn: 在芬兰，纯化论者坚持说只能加白桦树皮。

sentences.sContent: After a lovely stretch running right along the edge of Lake Baikal we moved away from birch and pine tree territory into lusher pastures.
sentences.sContent_eng: After a lovely stretch running right along the edge of Lake Baikal we moved away from birch and pine tree territory into lusher pastures.
sentences.sCn: 在沿着贝加尔湖的一段美妙行程之后，我们离开了桦树和松树的地域，进入了令人迷醉的大草原。

sentences.sContent: This also explains why some migrants from east Asia to northern Europe suddenly develop an allergic reaction to jackfruit once they have come into contact with birch pollen.
sentences.sContent_eng: This also explains why some migrants from east Asia to northern Europe suddenly develop an allergic reaction to jackfruit once they have come into contact with birch pollen.
sentences.sCn: 这也解释了为什么来自东亚的某些移民，到了北欧后，一旦接触到桦树花粉，会突然出现菠萝蜜过敏反应的现象。

words.tran: 桦树的；桦木制的；桦木的

trans.tranOther: a tree with smooth  bark (=  outer covering  )  and thin branches, or the wood from this tree
